ingredients.ingredient: 32 peeled and deveined medium shrimp, tail-on
1 (4 ounce) can pickled jalapeno peppers, cut into slivers

cookingTips: Pat shrimp dry before stuffing to ensure bacon crisps properly
Insert jalapeno sliver into each shrimp before wrapping with bacon
Secure with toothpick and fry at 350Â°F until bacon is crispy, about 3-4 minutes
